subject: Re: Dear
body:

You are to open a new bank account for swift transfer. 
 
 
 You can confirm the same with Mr. John Martin Wingard from the UK who has already received his funds.

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Dear Dr. Boyden But,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared about opening a new bank account for swift transfer. It's interesting to hear that Mr. John Martin Wingard from the UK has already received his funds through this process.

Could you please provide me with more details about how this swift transfer works? How long does it usually take for the funds to be transferred? Are there any fees or charges associated with opening the new bank account?

I look forward to hearing back from you and learning more about this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Tom

subject: Re: Payment
body:

body:

subject: Re: Payment
body:
Dear Mr. Tom, 
 
 In reference to your mail with the specified questions asked , regarding the conclusion of this transaction. 
 Question 1.  The source of funds is either based on the unclaimed fund which your details or Information was provided in terms of your not claiming the fund, it might be a lottery fund that you refuse to claim or investment which you were cheated on without a full payment from the investment or Business that went wrong. This information is provided to you for you to decide, if you are willing to claim the fund. 
 Question 2. The purpose of the transfer is based on the program to compensate you for all your losses that you have incurred as explained above. 
 Question 3. In terms of any transaction from the Bank, there will be charges that the bank might require from you like Bank transfer charges or they might require to ask you to open a non-resident investment account, where the fund will be deposited first before it could be forwarded to any account you provided or they might ask to send an ATM Card, which will enable you withdraw the fund from any ATM machine in your Country. 
 I hope your Question is answered and if you are willing to proceed, Please provide me with your details that will enable me file for the release of your fund with the paying Bank. 
Yours truly,  I urgently wait for the confirmation of this mail. 
Dr. Boyden But 
Foreign Operations Manager 
E-mail: forex.fnb@financier.com 
Tel: +27732369963 
First National Bank, a division of First-Rand Bank Limited. Reg No. 1929/001225/06. 
An Authorized Financial Services and Credit Provider (NCRCP20

subject: Re: Payment
body:
Dear Dr. Boyden But,

Thank you for your prompt response and for providing me with the information regarding the source of funds. It seems like there are various possibilities as to where the funds could come from, such as unclaimed funds, lottery winnings, or even a failed investment or business venture. I appreciate you explaining these options to me.

Regarding the purpose of the transfer, it is interesting to hear that it is part of a program to compensate for any losses I may have incurred in the past. That sounds quite generous. Could you please provide more details about how this compensation program works? How exactly will the funds be transferred to me?

You mentioned that there might be some charges involved in the process, such as bank transfer charges or opening an investment account. Could you please clarify what these charges are for and how much they would amount to? Additionally, if an ATM card is required, how would I go about receiving it and ensuring its security?

Before proceeding further, I would like to know more about the paying bank and their reputation. Can you provide me with some background information on First National Bank? Are they a well-established institution with a good track record?

I look forward to your response and thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Tom

subject: Re: Payment
body:
Dear Dr. Boyden But,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment transfer. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. Before I provide you with my banking details, could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. Could you confirm the exact amount of the payment that has been approved for transfer?
2. What is the purpose or reason behind this payment? Is it related to any specific transaction or service?
3. Can you provide some more information about First National Bank and its division, Bank Limited? I would like to know more about their reputation and credibility.

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Tom

subject: Re: Payment
body:
Dear Mr. Tom, 
 I am sending you a non-resident investment application form attached, as this is part of the transfer process, if you wish to proceed with this option or you prefer sending your banking details as we can process the fund and transfer it directly into your account. But the non-resident investment account will enable us open a non-resident investment account, where the mentioned amount will be deposited and an ATM Card will be issued, forwarded to your postal address and once it is received, we will be sending you the Pin, that will enable you withdraw the fund through any ATM Machine in your Country. Once you confirm the receipt of the Card, it will be activated allowing you access to make withdrawal of large amounts or do any local transfer into your account. 
 We will send the ATM Card through DHL Courier service registering the postage before it is sent to you and once sent, we will be sending you the tracking code confirming the parcel has left to your address. 
 First National Bank is the most reputable Bank in South Africa and offers the best services with a good track Record and you will be able to understand this explanation once the transfer process starts. 
Yours truly, I will wait to hear from you the best option you have decided to proceed on this transaction. 
Dr. Boyden But 
Foreign Operations Manager 
E-mail: forex.fnb@financier.com 
Tel: +27732369963 
First National Bank, a division of First-Rand Bank Limited. Reg No. 1929/001225/06. 
An Authorized Financial Services and Credit Provider (NCRCP20

subject: Re: Payment
body:
Dear Dr. Boyden But,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your offer, but I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please explain in more detail how the investment account works? What are the potential benefits and risks involved?

2. How long does the transfer process usually take? Is there any specific timeline I should be aware of?

3. Could you provide some references or testimonials from other clients who have used this service successfully?

4. What security measures are in place to protect my personal and financial information during the transfer process?

I look forward to hearing back from you with these clarifications so that I can make an informed decision.

Best wishes,
Tom

subject: Re: Payment
body:
Dear Mr. Tom, 
 
 It is very unfortunate that you keep repeating the same questions all the time after they have been answered. Well, I don’t want to be rude on this matter and I am not forcing you to claim the fund. 
 I have explained myself toward the execution arrangement of this transaction to the best of my ability and I am not ready to keep repeating myself as if I am forcing you to claim the fund.  It is left for you to decide or decline the process. 
Yours truly, Keep well and enjoy the rest of the day ahead of you. 
Dr. Boyden But 
Foreign Operations Manager

subject: Re: Payment
body:
Dear Mr. Tom, 
 
 
You act as if you have not seen the attached non-resident application form which was sent to you. If you are interested to proceed, I will suggest you either fill the application or request for a transfer form that will enable us conclude this transaction as I don't enjoy all this unnecessary and unprofessional discussion about the transaction after explaining myself, you keep asking the same question all the time. 
 
Fill the form and request for a transfer application form that will enable us transfer the fund into your account as you will provide or fill the non-resident investment account opening form that will enable us set up an account on your name, issue an ATM Card that will be forwarded to you. 
 
Please confirm your option . 
Yours truly, 
Dr. Boyden But 
Foreign Operations Manager 
E-mail: forex.fnb@financier.com 
Tel: +27732369963

subject: Re: Payment
body:
Dear Dr. Boyden But,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if it seemed like I missed the attached form. Could you please resend it to me? I want to make sure I have all the necessary information before proceeding.

I understand that you mentioned filling out a form or requesting a transfer form. Could you please explain in more detail what these forms are for and how they will enable us to conclude this process? I just want to make sure I fully understand the steps involved.

Additionally, you mentioned setting up an investment account and issuing an ATM card. Could you provide more information about the benefits of having an investment account and how the ATM card would be useful?

Thank you for your patience in answering my questions. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tom
